item.title: Handling a Severe Head-On Impact
item.description: A serious collision calls for precision and teamwork — see how the crew manages a tough recovery after a head-on impact.

media:content.media:title: Handling a Severe Head-On Impact
media:content.media:description: A serious collision calls for precision and teamwork — see how the crew manages a tough recovery after a head-on impact.

item.title: Heavy Lifting with the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers
item.description: Big machines, big tasks — just another day for the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers as they take on some serious heavy lifting with ease.

item.title: Firefighters and Towing Experts Unite!
item.description: Teamwork in action! See how firefighters and towing professionals join forces to handle a challenging recovery with skill and precision.

item.title: Nissan 350Z Pulled From the Creek!
item.description: A tough recovery mission! See how we haul a Nissan 350Z out of the creek and back onto solid ground.

item.title: Caught in a bind? We've got the unwind. ��
item.description: When things get stuck, we get rolling! Watch how a tricky recovery turns into a smooth save with skill and horsepower.

item.title: Code 3 Call: Fiery Pickup Truck on Interstate!
item.description: Code 3 Call: Fiery Pickup Truck on Interstate! #reel #interstate #pickup #tow #fblifestyle

item.title: It’s Tator Time To The Rescue! ����
item.description: Join Tator on another wild recovery mission! From quick thinking to heavy towing, watch how teamwork and skill get the job done once again.

item.title: Bridge Collision Sparks Hazmat and Traffic Chaos
item.description: An 18-wheeler strikes a bridge, causing a hazmat scare and massive traffic delays. Crews rush to contain the scene and restore order on the roadway.

item.title: Recovering a Truck & Trailer That Missed the Exit Ramp
item.description: Watch the careful recovery of a truck and trailer that missed its exit — skill, precision, and teamwork in action

item.title: Mike’s School Bus Towing Training
item.description: Follow Mike as he trains on towing a full-size school bus — a challenging lesson in strength and control.

item.title: The Complex Process of Towing a Fire Truck!
item.description: The Complex Process of Towing a Fire Truck! #reel #towing #firetruck #fblifestyle

item.title: A Bobcat Crashes the Worksite!
item.description: An unexpected guest shows up in the middle of the job — see what happens when a curious Bobcat decides to join the action..

item.title: Removing a Jackknifed Trailer from a Busy Road!
item.description: A challenging recovery unfolds as the crew works fast to safely clear a jackknifed trailer and reopen the road.

item.title: 5 Years Submerged:: The First Steps Toward Recovery
item.description: After years underwater, the recovery begins. Watch as the team carefully brings this long-lost machine back to life.

item.title: Log Truck Rolls on Busy Road - Driver is OK
item.description: A log truck overturns on a crowded roadway, but thanks to safety measures and swift response, the driver escapes unharmed.

item.title: Miracle on the Wrong Side
item.description: A close call becomes a moment of gratitude as quick thinking turns potential disaster into a roadside miracle.

item.title: A Tow Wife's Unexpected Date Night
item.description: When work and life collide, a tow call turns into a surprise date night — humor and heart from life on the road.

item.title: The Great Jeep Escape
item.description: A wild day on the trail turns into an unforgettable Jeep escape — teamwork, recovery, and plenty of mud along the way.

item.title: A Large Tractor Is Stuck in a Significant Ditch!
item.description: A massive tractor ends up trapped in a deep ditch — watch the careful recovery process as the crew works to bring it safely back on solid ground.

item.title: That Was A Close Call!
item.description: A tense moment on the job nearly ends in disaster — quick thinking and steady teamwork make all the difference.
